function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 through in-person contact during data collection","Impact":"Risk of transmission of the virus to survey respondents and data collectors","Mitigation":"Implement strict safety protocols during in-person data collection, including mask-wearing and social distancing","Technologies":"Contactless data collection methods, such as online surveys and virtual interviews","People":"Survey respondents, data collectors","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Inadequate protection of sensitive data shared during online survey","Impact":"Risk of data breaches and privacy violations for survey respondents","Mitigation":"Use encrypted data storage and secure transmission protocols for online survey data collection","Technologies":"Encryption software, secure data servers, secure communication protocols","People":"Survey respondents, research team","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Propagation of unverified information about COVID-19 through social media sharing","Impact":"Increased spread of misinformation leading to public confusion and risk of incorrect behaviors related to COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement fact-checking processes for survey questions related to COVID-19 and educate respondents about the importance of verifying information before sharing","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, educational materials on information verification","People":"Survey respondents, social media users","Owner":"Research team"}]}
